R

RequestProcessor - Class in net.iozhukov.server.service
The class implements the Runnable interface.
The object of this class executes the request:
Reading headers Header parsing Search for the requested resource Sending a Resource
RequestProcessor(Socket) - Constructor for class net.iozhukov.server.service.RequestProcessor
The constructor configures the input and output streams, from which the files will come and where they will go.
ResourceReader - Class in net.iozhukov.utilits
The class determines which resource it is asking for, and returns it or the error page.
ResourceReader() - Constructor for class net.iozhukov.utilits.ResourceReader
 
Response - Class in net.iozhukov.server.service
Class for creating Data Transfer Object necessary for server service operation.
Also, due to the operation of the multi-threaded application, it collects the processing log internally to output it after the client responds.
Response() - Constructor for class net.iozhukov.server.service.Response
 
run() - Method in class net.iozhukov.server.service.RequestProcessor
 
run() - Method in class net.iozhukov.server.service.ServerTimer
